metadata.name: Bank Shot!
metadata.description:
Bank shot! Billiard tears.
Bank shot is an item that makes it so Isaac's tears never drop out of the air and instead, will come to a halt when they hit their max range. It also makes it so your tears now collide with each other with a satisfying clack, letting you ricochet tears off each other into enemies, or fill the room with tears and push them into em! You can find this item in Treasure Rooms.
See it in action here: https://gfycat.com/MisguidedFaroffBunny Synergies: https://gfycat.com/MeanBewitchedCob
Code by your boy Scayze and art by your other boy Ashkait.
